Vincentas Grinius, CEO of IPXO, shares insights from over 14 years in the web hosting industry. He talks about the challenges in the shared hosting market and why it's tough to stand out. Vincentas believes that focusing on support or uptime isn't enough - everyone does that. The real secret to success? Finding your growth formula through a unique selling point that makes people choose your service. Want to know more? Tune in to the latest episode on webhosting.today and on platforms like YouTube, Apple Podcasts, and Spotify. #WebhostingToday #Podcast #IPXO #GrowthFormula #USP

Initially available only to trademark holders, they will be open for general registration by the end of September, offering businesses fresh opportunities for unique online identities. ‚ùó.com Price Increase Impact As we have covered recently, Verisign will raise .com domain prices by 7% starting in September. In our opinion, this pressure, along with the rise of new TLDs, is shaping future trends in the domain market.
